jshintrc.template:
{
    "bitwise": true,
    "camelcase": true,
    "eqeqeq": true,
    "globals": { "describe" : false, "it": false, "beforeEach": false },
    "globalstrict": false,
    "indent": 4,
    "laxbreak": true,
    "maxparams": 3,
    "multistr": true,
    "newcap": true,
    "node": true,
    "quotmark": "double",
    "trailing": true,
    "undef": true,
    "unused": true
}
